divs: Sighting DetailsI was washing dishes it appeared out the window far to the south. In the Southwest, at first object looked like a bright planet, but on further inspection it was bomerang shape with 3 red lights on each point at the bottom. A bright beam of light pointing North. A bright focused light seemed to be beaming in specific directions in intervals. Then 4 bright objects were shot out from the south side about one minute apart, in a direct horizontal line. The object became very bright before fading over the horizon to the west. I have never seen anything like this, at one point it looked like a perfect triangle with a bright light on the top. I did not have any particular feelings, other than wishing someone else was with me to bare witness. I sent warm greetings, and peace to all life. I must not that earlier today around noon I felt an intense sound pressure in my ears.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around January 22nd 2009
